statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeBenefits;
SELECT employee_id, health_insurance, retirement_plan FROM EmployeeBenefits;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT employee_id, perks FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE health_insurance = 'Yes';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeBenefits ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeBenefits ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT health_insurance, retirement_plan FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE health_insurance = 'Medical Insurance';
SELECT employee_id, perks FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE retirement_plan = '401k';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM EmployeeBenefits;
SELECT * FROM benefits WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT benefit_id, health_insurance, retirement_plan FROM benefits WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM employees ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM benefits WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, health_insurance, retirement_plan FROM benefits WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM benefits WHERE retirement_plan IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_id, health_insurance, retirement_plan, perks FROM benefits WHERE employee_id = 3 AND perks = 'gym membership';
SELECT * FROM health_insurance;
SELECT insurance_provider, coverage_type FROM health_insurance WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM retirement_plans ORDER BY plan_type DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT contribution FROM retirement_plans WHERE employee_id = 200;
SELECT perk_name, LEFT(perk_description, 20) AS brief_description FROM perks WHERE employee_id = 300;
SELECT employee_id, insurance_provider FROM health_insurance WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT plan_type, contribution FROM retirement_plans WHERE contribution > 5000 ORDER BY contribution DESC;
SELECT employee_id, perk_name, perk_description FROM perks WHERE employee_id = 2005 AND perk_name LIKE 'Gym%';
SELECT * FROM health_insurance LEFT JOIN retirement_plans ON health_insurance.employee_id = retirement_plans.employee_id;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, insurance_provider FROM health_insurance ORDER BY insurance_provider ASC, employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_insurance;
SELECT employee_id, provider, plan_type FROM health_insurance WHERE monthly_premium > 500;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT plan_name, contribution_rate FROM retirement_plans WHERE vesting_schedule = '3 years';
SELECT perk_name, description FROM perks WHERE perk_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM health_insurance ORDER BY monthly_premium DESC, provider
SELECT employee_id, plan_type, provider FROM health_insurance WHERE provider LIKE 'A%' OR plan_type = 'Dental' ORDER BY provider, plan_type
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, r.plan_name, r.contribution_rate FROM employees e JOIN retirement_plans r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id
SELECT p.perk_name, p.description, e.first_name FROM perks p LEFT JOIN employees e ON p.perk_id = e.employee_id
SELECT MAX(monthly_premium) AS max_premium, MIN(monthly_premium) AS min_premium FROM health_insurance
SELECT * FROM health_insurance;
SELECT employee_id, insurance_provider, coverage_type FROM health_insurance WHERE monthly_premium > 500;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT plan_name, contribution_rate FROM retirement_plans WHERE contribution_rate >= 5.00;
SELECT employee_id, benefit_type, benefit_value FROM employee_benefits WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT insurance_provider, coverage_type, monthly_premium FROM health_insurance WHERE monthly_premium > 500 ORDER BY monthly_premium DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, plan_name, contribution_rate FROM retirement_plans WHERE contribution_rate < 3 ORDER BY contribution_rate ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, perk_name, perk_type, LENGTH(perk_description) AS perk_description_length FROM employee_perks ORDER BY perk_description_length DESC LIMIT 5;
